remarks: The group inverse is a one-to-one onto function.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
statement:
grpinvinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpinvinv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
grpinv11.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
grpinvf1o $p |- ( ph -> N : B -1-1-onto-> B ) $.
